Text.Page:
The archdevas carry out unspeakable acts here. I believe this is the source of the demokrons.

We must put an end to this nightmare. Destroy the facility and slay its inhabitants.

Spare none lest they resume their filthy work elsewhere.

Your valor will ensure we face fewer abominations like the demokrons. Any chance to spare our soldiers such horrors is worth the time.

Thank you, ."For the Federation!"
